Package de.stocker.json

Class JsonFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stocker.json.JsonFactory
  • public final class JsonFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory for creating Java objects from JSON strings and creating JSON strings from Java objects. Used to translate the data coming from the data providers in JSON format to the Java classes of the data base model, and to translate Java objects to JSON formatted strings in order to write them to disk for persistence of the application state.
    Author:
    Matthias Rudolph

    • Method Detail

      • jsonToObject

        public static <T> T jsonToObject​(java.lang.String json,
                                 java.lang.Class<T> classOfT)
        Produces a Java object from a JSON string. Method is parameterized and works for all classes offering the matching fields for a specific JSON input string.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON input string
        classOfT - the class of the generic type of the target object (append ".class")
        Returns:
        an object of the specified type

      • objectToJson

        public static <T> java.lang.String objectToJson​(T inputObject)
        Produces a JSON formatted string from a Java object of the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type of the input object
        Parameters:
        inputObject - the input object
        Returns:
        the JSON formatted string
